metadata.title: CVE-2015-9541 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Qt through 5.14 allows an exponential XML entity expansion attack via acrafted SVG document that is mishandled in QXmlStreamReader, a relatedissue to CVE-2003-1564.

criterions.comment: qt4-x11 package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
phantomjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
pyside package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
